name: Psych: The Game
storyline: Based on the Hit USA TV show, Shawn Spencer is a private detective who has an almost supernatural gift for crime-solving – so much so that the local police department hires him as their Psychic Advisor! Shawn quickly finds that his gifts, although formidable, don't exactly keep him out of trouble. Help Shawn and his best friend Gus find clues, solve puzzles, and unravel mysteries in this humorous Hidden Object adventure game!
summary:
In Psych, you play as the brilliant Shawn Spencer, a private detective with a knack for solving crimes. Thanks to his unique abilities, the local police department hires him as their psychic advisor. Your mission is to help Shawn and his team solve a deadly case in Santa Barbara, California, using your keen observation and puzzle-solving skills. The unparalleled storyline and engaging gameplay make it the perfect choice for fans of the television show and hidden object games.
You will explore over 40 locations in sunny Santa Barbara while completing dozens of mini-games and puzzles. Along the way, you will interact with all your favorite characters from the hit show, including Gus and Lassiter, as you unravel mysteries and enjoy hilarious dialogue. Experience the thrill of solving a case as a private detective, all while immersing yourself in the beloved and humorous world of Psych.
